newsitem.title: FRANCE: SGS-Thomson rises further ahead of results.
newsitem.headline: SGS-Thomson rises further ahead of results.

text.p: Shares in semi-conductor group SGS-Thomson Microelectronics NV posted solid gains on Wednesday for the second day running ahead of the publication of its first half results on Thursday morning.

At 0831 GMT, SGS-Thomson was up 7.59 percent at 581 francs. It made a 7.78 percent gain on Tuesday. Dealers expect a good set of figures following an earnings surprise at Motorola last week and good figures from Intel and Texas Instruments overnight.
SGS-Thomson made a profit warning in June which caused a decline in its share.
